title: Rocket, Brie and crispy prosciutto salad with croûtons

For the salad: ½ bunch fresh wild rocket, washed
2 tbsp fresh flatleaf parsley, leaves only
For the croutons: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the salad, toss all the salad ingredients (except the prosciutto) together in a large bowl.
Heat a frying pan and fry the prosciutto until crisp on both sides.
Remove the prosciutto from the pan and place on top of the salad.
For the croutons, heat the olive oil and butter together in a pan and fry the bread cubes until golden on all sides.
Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and place on top of the salad. Serve.
